home about me notes search and rank

I am Chunheng Jiang. I am interested in machine learning (e.g. (un)supervised and reinforcement learning), artificial intelligence (AI), information retrieval (IR), their applications in voting (e.g. computational social choice) and ranking (e.g. ranking learning and ranking aggregation) problems. I like to develop simple but efficient algorithms, write codes in Java and Python, and take notes with LaTex. You can find me at GitHub, Research Gate, or drop me emails: jiangchunheng@gmail.com.
